name: Singularity
summary: Enter an immersive, science fiction shooter on a station stranded in the depths of space. Fight to the death against killer robots as you explore narrow corridors, treacherous lifts and zero-gravity environments. You will need to work together with your squad to get out alive, and find the answers you're looking for.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Singularity - Battle AI Gone Rogue - Exclusive to Zero Latency VR
